function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transparent communication about changing regulations and pandemic impact","Impact":"Consumer uncertainty and reluctance to leave homes","Mitigation":"Continual updates and clear communication about safety measures and regulations","Technologies":"Social media, email newsletters, website updates","People":"Consumers, food truck owners","Owner":"Food truck owners"},{"Description":"Signalling heritage and cultural identity through food and branding","Impact":"Strong feelings of belongingness among specific ethnic or subcultural groups","Mitigation":"Respectful representation, cultural sensitivity, and inclusive marketing","Technologies":"Social media, branding material, customer engagement platforms","People":"Customers, food truck owners","Owner":"Food truck owners"},{"Description":"Memorializing family members in food business promotion","Impact":"Emotional connection and sense of nostalgia but no direct risk related to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Not applicable","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Customers, family members","Owner":"Food truck owners"}]}
